医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
怀孕前和怀孕期间接触酒精是否与胎儿纵向生长减慢有关？怀孕期间接触酒精与纵向生长之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Is-alcohol-exposure-before-and-during-pregnancy-linked-with-reduced-longitudinal-fetal-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Is-alcohol-exposure-before-and-during-pregnancy- Associate-with-reduced-longitudinal-fetal-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1910b0a6-540c-47df-86fa-9dd8d20808e3 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 04:54:00 -0400 Is alcohol exposure before and during pregnancy associated with reduced longitudinal fetal growth?
童年创伤会影响大流行的恢复力吗？研究调查了 COVID-19 期间不良经历与心理、身体健康之间的联系研究人员调查了 COVID-19 初期报告的睡眠质量、身体健康和心理健康变化是否与 ACE 相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Can-childhood-traumas-affect-pandemic-resilience-Study-investigates-connection- Between-adverse-experiences-and-mental-physical-health-during- COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Can-childhood-traumas-affect-pandemic-resilience-Study-investigates-connection- Between-adverse-experiences-and-mental-physical-health-during- COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d50aeafb-7d81-4f5d-be85-ee166015e0d6 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 04:28:00 -0400 Can childhood traumas affect pandemic resilience? Study investigates connection between adverse experiences and mental, physical health during COVID-19
研究揭示了以前未知的尿液生物标志物，彻底改变了 COVID-19 等病毒感染的早期检测和治疗这项最近的研究利用光谱分析确定了用于检测急性 COVID-19 的新尿液生物标志物。研究结果表明，这些生物标志物可以为早期诊断、了解疾病的严重程度提供有价值的工具，并可能有助于针对 SARS-CoV-2 的内源性免疫防御机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-unveils-previously-unknown-urinary-biomarkers-revolutionizing-early-detection-and-treatment-of-viral-infections-like-COVID-19。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-unveils-previously-unknown-urinary-biomarkers-revolutionizing-early-detection-and-treatment-of-viral-infections-like-COVID-19。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7706aba1-d981-42aa-94a8-b7e0977e51eb Tue, 29 Aug 2023 00:26:00 -0400 Study unveils previously unknown urinary biomarkers, revolutionizing early detection and treatment of viral infections like COVID-19
我们是否未能缩小全球 HPV 疫苗覆盖率的差距？研究显示，全球 84 个国家的 HPV 疫苗覆盖率存在明显不平等，宫颈癌负担最高的国家往往疫苗接种率最低。然而，世卫组织的新建议和疫苗供应的增加可能有助于缩小这一差距并改善公平获取。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Are-we-failing-to-bridge-the-gap-in-HPV-vaccine-coverage-globally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Are-we-failing-to-bridge-the-gap-in-HPV-vaccine-coverage-globally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=556c2157-c7db-456f-a919-aae286ef6951 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 00:08:00 -0400 Are we failing to bridge the gap in HPV vaccine coverage globally?
基于唾液的自动化 PCR 检测能否成为 COVID-19 监测的未来？在伦敦国王学院资助的一项大规模研究中，研究人员利用无症状学生和教职员工的唾液样本，成功实施了基于 PCR 的 SARS-CoV-2 自动化检测项目。该系统实现了 85% 的灵敏度和 100% 的特异性，在八小时内快速提供结果，并为 COVID-19 的社区监测提供了一种经济有效且可扩展的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Could-automated-saliva-based-PCR-testing-be-the-future-of-COVID-19-surveillance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Could-automated-saliva-based-PCR-testing-be-the-future-of-COVID-19-surveillance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1c9f221-4c86-4b62-b463-bbd4affa9568 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 23:49:00 -0400 Could automated, saliva-based PCR testing be the future of COVID-19 surveillance?
人工智能能否改变帕金森病远程诊断的游戏规则？用于帕金森氏症诊断的新人工智能工具使用网络摄像头捕获的手指敲击测试视频，其表现优于经过认证的评估者，几乎与专家相当。该技术有望实现远程自动诊断，特别是在缺乏神经护理的地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Could-AI-be-the-game-changer-in-remote-Parkinsons-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Could-AI-be-the-game-changer-in-remote-Parkinsons-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf338e01-998a-4a17-a046-754b31b736e6 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 23:33:00 -0400 Could AI be the game-changer in remote Parkinson's diagnosis?
利用基于社区的数字干预措施保护坦桑尼亚儿童免受可预防的感染卫生服务政策和管理副教授扬·奥斯特曼（Jan Ostermann）正在领导一个新项目，以提高农村和服务欠缺地区儿童的疫苗接种率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Using-community-based-digital-intervention-to-protect-Tanzanian-children-from-preventable-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Using-community-based-digital-intervention-to-protect-Tanzanian-children-from-preventable-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47754ef5-80f9-4c16-802c-2a43c7f2e603 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 23:20:00 -0400 Using community-based digital intervention to protect Tanzanian children from preventable infections
炎症饮食会增加痴呆和阿尔茨海默病的风险这项研究将较高的饮食炎症指数 (DII) 分数与患痴呆症（特别是阿尔茨海默病）的风险增加联系起来。研究结果表明，抗炎饮食可能为痴呆症提供预防策略，强调需要进一步研究来验证这些关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Inflammatory-diets-raise-dementia-and-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Inflammatory-diets-raise-dementia-and-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ee926e0-e1bc-4b3e-98d4-f55337395040 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 23:16:00 -0400 Inflammatory diets raise dementia and Alzheimer's risk
研究强调了晚期肺癌护理中共同决策的挑战一项新的研究表明，患者可能会遇到共同决定减少和有关癌症治疗的信息不足的情况，而医生则面临着提供他们认为无用的治疗的压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Study-highlights-challenges-of-shared-decision-making-in-advanced-lung-cancer-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Study-highlights-challenges-of-shared-decision-making-in-advanced-lung-cancer-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e42dcca8-7f38-4820-96a2-466edc19290e Mon, 28 Aug 2023 23:14:37 -0400 Study highlights challenges of shared decision-making in advanced lung cancer care
在线测试通过生物标志物精度确定早期阿尔茨海默病诊断研究人员利用牛津认知测试门户开发了一种新型数字认知测试平台，该平台与血清学生物标志物相关联，以准确测量阿尔茨海默氏症患者的认知障碍。该研究强调了该平台在捕捉细微损伤迹象方面的有效性，可能会彻底改变阿尔茨海默病的早期诊断和跟踪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Online-test-nails-early-Alzheimers-diagnosis-with-biomarker- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Online-test-nails-early-Alzheimers-diagnosis-with-biomarker- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0b006fa-13e8-4b8c-b831-9eeaafdb7302 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 23:00:00 -0400 Online test nails early Alzheimer's diagnosis with biomarker precision
